text: (visvasavantayini!) dharmaya himi ayagen niyata vasayenma (mevænnanda) samaharek sitinnaha. ovun allahvada, obata pahala karana lada (mema) dharmayada, ovunta pahala karana lada (anit) dæyada, visvasa kara, allahtada biyavi katayutu karannaha. ovun allahge ayavan di sulu mudalak laba ganneda næta. mevænnanta ovunge phalavipaka ovunge deviyan vetin (imahat vu dæya vasayen) ætteya. niyata vasayenma allah (ovunge) gananaya bælimehi itamat tivravantayeku vanneya
